response.original_title: Evgeny Plushenko & Edvin Marton - Live on Ice
response.overview: The passion and energy of Evgeny Plushenko and Edvin Marton has fascinated millions all over the world. This first-ever exclusive DVD provides an opportunity to see this dream team live on the ice. Evgeny Plushenko - Worlds greatest Figure Scating Talent. Three time World Champion, Three Time European Champion, Olympic Games Silver Medalist. Since 1996 he won 48 Gold Medals, he made figure scating history with 4-3-3 jump combination. Edvin Marton - playing on the worlds best Antonio Stradivarius violin from 1698, Two time Gold Medal winner of the World Violin Competition. Scating to Edvin Marton's music, Evgeny Plushenko won 12 Gold Medals.
response.title: Evgeny Plushenko & Edvin Marton - Live on Ice
